text: Stanisław Grędziński (19 October 1945 – 19 January 2022) was a Polish sprinter. He was born in Ostrzyca, Poland.Sports Reference Grędziński won two gold medals at the European Athletics Championships in 1966. He came in fourth place at the 1968 Summer Olympics. Grędziński died on 19 January 2022, at the age of 77.Nie żyje Stanisław Grędziński. Były mistrz Europy miał 77 lat, sport.onet.pl ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish sprinters Category:Olympians for Poland
title: Stanisław Grędziński
